scripts.clean: rm -rf lib dist types build tsconfig.tsbuildinfo
scripts.codegen: rm -rf src/generatedNoCheck/* && osdk-unstable-typescript generate --outDir src/generatedNoCheck --ontologyPath ontology.json --beta true --packageType module --version dev --internal
scripts.transpile: find . \( -path build/cjs -or -path build/esm -or -path build/browser \) -type f \( -name '*.js' -or -name '*.js.map' -or -name '*.cjs' -or -name '*.cjs.map' \) -delete && tsup
scripts.typecheck: find . \( -path build/cjs -or -path build/esm -or -path build/browser \) -type f \( -name '*.ts' -or -name '*.ts.map' -or -name '*.cts' -or -name '*.cts.map' \) -delete && ../../../scripts/build_common/typecheck.sh esm
